Function.Description: The substitute function substitutes a substring of a given Text or String with a substring of another Text or String.

Brief.Overview: The substitute function substitutes one specified Text substring for another substring in a given Text or String.
Brief.Usage: Use the substitute function when you want to replace specified Text in one or more places in a Text or String. Use the replace function when you want to replace a Text substring that occurs in a specific location in a Text or String.

Argument.Name: string
Argument.Note: The String or Text that you want to modify.

Argument.Name: old-text
Argument.Note: A String or Text to be substituted.

Argument.Name: new-text
Argument.Note: The new Text or String to be inserted place of old-text

Argument.Name: count
Argument.Note: Optional. If present, it must be a number specifying the number of times old-text is to be substituted. If not present, all instances are substituted.

Syntax.Return: The result string after the substitute has been done
